actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Western Hemisphere Affairs.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President of Mexico has been improperly impugned by an anonymous source in a United States newspaper column, and that the government of the United States should apologize to the government of Mexico for this attack.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President of Mexico has been unduly impugned and the United States Government should apologize to Mexico for the undocumented rumors it has spread against him.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President of Mexico has been improperly impugned by an anonymous source in a United States newspaper column, and that the government of the United States should apologize to the government of Mexico for this attack.
